thread.title: JLL TAPPED AS EXCLUSIVE COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE PROMOTIONAL PARTNER FOR CFO STUDIO - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: JLL TAPPED AS EXCLUSIVE COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE PROMOTIONAL PARTNER FOR CFO STUDIO - Yahoo Finance

author: CFO Studio
title: JLL TAPPED AS EXCLUSIVE COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE PROMOTIONAL PARTNER FOR CFO STUDIO - Yahoo Finance
text:
SOMERSET, N.J., Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Andrew Zezas, Publisher and Host of CFO Studio, announced today that JLL, a global financial and professional services firm specializing in commercial real estate and investment management, has become the exclusive commercial real estate promotional partner to CFO Studio.
CFO Studio leverages new and traditional media, as well as business conferences, networking events and targeted gatherings to benefit CFOs and senior finance executives in major markets in the United States and Canada.
"We're extremely pleased that JLL has elected to become a CFO Studio promotional partner," said Andrew Zezas. "JLL will play an integral role as CFO Studio expands into major U.S. markets."
"We are excited about our partnership with CFO Studio, a powerful platform that provides news, information and resources to the CFO community," said Robert Kossar, Executive Managing Director and Market Director for JLL's New Jersey operations. "This new relationship will help to expand JLL's reach in New Jersey and in markets throughout the United States."
JLL joins other prestigious promotional partners, including Deloitte, SAP, New York Jets, Robert Half, BofA, BDO, Oracle, ReedSmith, Russell Investments, Tidemark, PwC, and regional firms, including WithumSmith+Brown, Tahas Technologies, Lowenstein Sandler, Revelwood, O'Connor Davies, and other fine organizations.
About CFO Studio
CFO Studio draws on the best of new and traditional media, and hosts exciting business conferences and events, to benefit CFOs and senior finance executives and the companies and executives that serve them. CFO Studio hosts in-person and digital conferences and events in major markets in the U.S. and Canada, publishes CFO Studio magazine, distributes information pertinent to the CFO experience, and offers various opportunities in which CFOs and senior finance executives can participate in the CFO conversation, enhance their careers, and promote the companies and organizations they serve. CFO Studio serves as a dynamic platform for CFOs and senior finance executives to promote themselves as thought-leaders in business, strategy, operations, and more; enhance the brands of the companies and organizations they serve; communicate, share knowledge, experiences, insights, and information with CFO peers; forge profitable relationships with CFO peers and best-in-class companies; and deploy their expertise to better serve their employees, their families, their organizations, and their communities. Visit www.CFOstudio.com 
About JLL
JLL ( JLL ) is a professional services and investment management firm offering specialized real estate services to clients seeking increased value by owning, occupying and investing in real estate. A Fortune 500 company with annual fee revenue of $4.7 billion and gross revenue of $5.4 billion, JLL has more than 230 corporate offices, operates in 80 countries and has a global workforce of approximately 58,000. On behalf of its clients, the firm provides management and real estate outsourcing services for a property portfolio of 3.4 billion square feet, or 316 million square meters, and completed $118 billion in sales, acquisitions and finance transactions in 2014. Its investment management business, LaSalle Investment Management, has $56.0 billion of real estate assets under management. JLL is the brand name, and a registered trademark, of Jones Lang LaSalle Incorporated. For further information, visit www.jll.com .
Media Contact: Lorenz Capalad, CFO Studio, 7328680000 x118, Lorenz.Capalad@CFOstudio.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
Professional Services commercial real estate
